import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CheckoutSteps from "./CheckoutSteps"; export default function Placeorder(props) { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) if(!cart.paymentMethod){ props.history.push('/Payment') } return( <>

  • Shipping

    Name:{cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address:{cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.address.city},{cart.shippingAddress.address.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.address.country}

  • Order Items

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (

    • {item.name}

      {item.qty} x {item.price} € = {item.qty*item.price}

      • ))}
); }
